body:
Hi Mostapha, I try to use the component named “Honeybee_Create CSV Schedule" but I get an error as following.
0. Runtime error (EncoderFallbackException): 'ascii' codec can't encode character '\u7F57' in position 147
1. Traceback:
  line 176, in main, "<string>"
  line 193, in script My Honeybee version is 0.0.58 NOV_07_2015 I'm really sorry for bothering you but could you give me some advices for this problem?
